attributes.action: Build a dialysis unit in Cheltenham
attributes.background: I live in Cheltenham and have to have dialysis 3 times a week. Every time I have to travel to Gloucester for treatment. It would be much cheaper saving travel costs and travel time if a unit was built in Cheltenham

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. This would be the responsibility of Gloucestershire Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust.

You can contact a Governor of the Trust whose role is to represent the public. You can find details here:

https://www.gloshospitals.nhs.uk/about-us/our-governors/
